caption:
17/11/22
After a year full of hard work, determination and dedication, it's finally time!!! 

Presenting EFFICIERE, our vehicle, our achievement ❤️

EFFICIERE is the upgraded model of our previous vehicle ADAMYA. Our new vehicle is more compact, faster and has a lower drag coefficient than the previous vehicle.

Through the course of this season we encountered many difficulties but despite it, the team's consistent effort and passion paved the way for the successful manufacturing of our vehicle. 

It was incredible to unveil our vehicle in our college premises amongst the teachers and enthusiastic students.

@shell_ecomarathon

Being our debut season, despite the difficult circumstances, the pandemic, the entire team did not lose hope amidst the difficulties and faced the opportunities with determination and zeal!🔥
The journey has been full of challenges and a lovely experience, and we aim ahead for the upcoming season.

Here's the summary of our first ever season in Shell Eco-Marathon for the year 2020/21.

The wait is finally over! Witness the Ultimate Supermileage Vehicle Design Reveal 🚙
DJS Miles presents to you EFFICIERE- the Supermileage prototype vehicle for the 2021-22 Shell Eco Marathon season✨

@shell_ecomarathon #shell #shellecomarathon #shellecomarathonasia #shellecomarathonindia #djsce #sae #energy #EV #electric #prototype #efficiency #sustainablefuture #makeinindia #mumbai
#design #reveal #designreveal #supermileage #greenfuture #makethefuture #milesahead #carsofinstagram #reelitfeelit #aesthetic #trendingnow

Sharing our experience at Shell Eco-marathon Asia Pacific and the Middle East 2024, held at Pertamina Mandalika International Circuit, Lombok, Indonesia 🇮🇩. We brought our second generation vehicle, Efficire, featuring a fully carbon fibre monocoque chassis 🚘.

The year 2024 was very special for the team as it was our first attempt at the on-track competition 🏁. The team had worked very hard to get the car on track, from resolving the logistics to making the car technical inspection ready, it has been a whole journey 🎯.

A total of 12 members had vistied the competition and we all have learnt a lot from it 📝. It was nerve-wracking, but the dedication and teamwork of the team members as well as the spirit of the competition is what got us through it ✨️🫂. 

We are also very proud to say that one of our drivers was selected to represent India in the opening ceremony and track walk 🇮🇳. 

We are very grateful to the teams that helped us and are also very happy to have helped others 🩵. We would like to thank our college DJSCE and SVKM for constantly supporting us and making all of this possible 🙌🏻. 

#milesahead #shellecomarathon

Here is a glimpse of us showcasing our supermileage electric vechicle, Efficiere at @taqneeqfest at the MPSTME campus! 🚗 Our team, DJS Miles was part of this awesome event where we displayed our eco-friendly ride. It was a super fun and exciting day filled with creativity and tech vibes. We made a ton of new connections and we are extremely grateful that we were presented the opportunity to showcase our vehicle. 

#taqneeq #taqneeqfest 
#TechFest #Innovation #GreenFuture
#efficiency #efficiere #fuelefficient #electricvehicle

We are excited to announce our collaboration with ALTER Technologies as our technical partner.
ALTER is an Indian manufacturer and retailer of e-cycles, Li-ion battery packs, and conversion kits that can be applied to existing vehicles to make them electric. Our team and Alter share a common goal of enhancing the automotive industry while also creating a cleaner, pollution-free environment. ALTER's sponsorship fuels our drive to achieve sustainability. 
We at DJS Miles are proud to welcome ALTER Technologies to our family, and together, let's #Alter the world for the better!

@shell_ecomarathon

Stay tuned for the Ultimate Supermileage Vehicle Design reveal for our upcoming Shell Eco-Marathon On Track competition ✨

Do you know? If you spend US$70 a week on food deliveries, you are contributing in increasing carbon footprint to about 450%.Online deliveries have increased significantly in today's world, especially from Covid times. Five out of ten 2 wheelers seen on the road are for food deliveries. Home-delivered food has a huge climate cost. We DJS Miles identified this issue and felt our social responsibility to conserve our mother earth. On the occasion of world environment day we conducted an "Eco-Friendly Delivery Drive."
Locating prime locations in the city and major food corners, we reached out to nearly 100+ delivery persons waiting to collect their food parcels and made them aware about this serious rising issue. We interacted with them making them understand how they could drive efficiently thus reducing carbon footprint, introduced them to Ev's and collected their opinions. 
We concluded the interaction with they taking an oath to protect our Mother Earth henceforth. We appealed them to stick a sticker about the same on their vehicle which will remind them their oath. 

So, here we did our job! What are you'll waiting for? We as a team would request and appeal you'll to help us in our campaign and do your own bit in making Earth a better place to live in!

@zomato @swiggyindia @dunzo_it @zeptonow 

@shell_ecomarathon
#shell #shellecomarathon #shellecomarathonasia #sustainablefuture #shellecomarathonindia #prototype #zomato #swiggy #worldenvironmentday #saveearth #ev

E-waste represents 7% of world's trash in landfills, but it equals 70% of overall toxic waste. Latest estimates shows that the world now discards approximately 50 million tonnes of e-waste per year. In 2021 alone, the global share of e-waste documented to be collected and properly recycled was just 17.4 percent. 

Taking into consideration these eye-opening facts, We team DJS Miles in collaboration with @karosambhav successfully carried out an E-Waste Campaign in our college, Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering from 25th to 28th May, 2022.

A webinar was conducted with Karo Sambhav on 25th May, 2022 to enlighten all the students about  E-waste management, circular economy along with the importance and methods of disposing E-Waste correctly, and how one could contribute towards a cleaner environment.

From 26th-28th May, we installed boxes and appealed to each and every student to come forward and donate their E-waste in the boxes. Achieving our goal, we successfully collected more than 100 kg of E-Waste from the students and the faculty and successfully sent them for recycling to Karo Sambhav. 

DJS Miles facilitated awareness among students, teachers and staff members on various aspects of e-waste management, circular economy, and leading a sustainable way of life.

"Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success."

Here are a few snippets of the progress in our manufacturing journey for the upcoming season✨

The CHASSIS of a vehicle is the foundation structure which supports its weight in ideal and dynamic states. 

The initial stage of designing the chassis was understanding the shape and design we wished to achieve while complying with the rules of the Shell Eco-Marathon competition. 

Upon completion of the designing of the chassis, the design was then split in sheets so that it could be desirably cut by the CNC machine which we would be using to make the "Pattern" which is an exact 1:1 replica of our design

The pattern of the chassis was then made by stacking layers of MDF sheets which were finely cut using CNC machining and later sanded to give us the desired chassis shape.

@shell_ecomarathon #shell #shellecomarathon #shellecomarathonasia #shellecomarathonindia #djsce #sae #energy #EV #electric #prototype #efficiency #sustainablefuture #makeinindia #mumbai

On the auspicious day of EARTH DAY, we at DJS MILES, organised and conducted a campaign, PRITHVI🌏

During this campaign, the members of our team interacted with people present at Marine Drive to educate them about the devastation that we as a society have caused to the environment.
The penultimate goal of this campaign was to provide people with solutions that they could implement into their day-to-day life for the prosperity of the environment. 

The individuals present, actively participated in writing down a pledge that they would execute to contribute to a greener and healthier future.🍀
